DataType.Comment: A default type indicating 'no type set'

DataType.name: FixedLength
DataType.Comment: A fixed length text data type

DataType.name: VariableLength
DataType.Comment: A variable length text data type

DataType.name: LargeLength
DataType.Comment: A large length text data type

DataType.name: SignedInteger
DataType.Comment: A signed integer numeric data type

DataType.name: SignedSmallInteger
DataType.Comment: A small signed integer numeric data type

DataType.name: SignedLargeInteger
DataType.Comment: A small signed integer numeric data type

DataType.name: UnsignedInteger
DataType.Comment: An unsigned integer numeric data type

DataType.name: UnsignedTinyInteger
DataType.Comment: A tiny unsigned integer numeric data type

DataType.name: UnsignedSmallInteger
DataType.Comment: A small unsigned integer numeric data type

DataType.name: UnsignedLargeInteger
DataType.Comment: A large unsigned integer numeric data type

DataType.name: AutoCounter
DataType.Comment: An auto counter numeric data type

DataType.name: FloatingPoint
DataType.Comment: A custom precision floating point numeric data type

DataType.name: SinglePrecisionFloatingPoint
DataType.Comment: A 32-bit floating point numeric data type

DataType.name: DoublePrecisionFloatingPoint
DataType.Comment: A 64-bit floating point numeric data type

DataType.name: Decimal
DataType.Comment: A decimal numeric data type

DataType.name: Money
DataType.Comment: A money numeric data type

DataType.name: FixedLength
DataType.Comment: A fixed length raw data data type

DataType.name: VariableLength
DataType.Comment: A variable length raw data data type

DataType.name: LargeLength
DataType.Comment: A large length raw data data type

DataType.name: Picture
DataType.Comment: A picture raw data data type

DataType.name: OleObject
DataType.Comment: An OLE object raw data data type

DataType.name: AutoTimestamp
DataType.Comment: An auto timestamp temporal data type

DataType.name: Time
DataType.Comment: A time temporal data type

DataType.name: Date
DataType.Comment: A date temporal data type

DataType.name: DateAndTime
DataType.Comment: A date and time temporal data type

DataType.name: TrueOrFalse
DataType.Comment: A true or false logical data type

DataType.name: YesOrNo
DataType.Comment: A yes or no logical data type

DataType.name: RowId
DataType.Comment: A row id data type (can not be classified in any of the groups above)

DataType.name: ObjectId
DataType.Comment: An object id data type (can not be classified in any of the groups above)
Used for the upper bounds of the enum values.
